Gary Rega . Apr 17, 2025

Is the iPhone 16 Pro waterproof?

Answer from Verizon Customer Support4 days

The iPhone 16 Pro is water-resistant with an IP68 rating. This means it can withstand splashes, water, and dust, and can even be submerged in up to 6 meters of water for up to 30 minutes. However, certain conditions are not suitable for the phone to withstand such as water jets or extreme temperatures. In addition, water resistance is not permanent and can degrade over time with normal wear. -Red

Was this answer helpful?

Can I use an apple pen

Answer from Verizon Customer Support7 days

Yes, you can use an Apple Pencil, but its compatibility depends on the specific iPad model and Apple Pencil type. The Apple Pencil (USB-C) is compatible with newer iPads, including the iPad Pro 13-inch (M4), iPad Pro 11-inch (M4), iPad Pro 12.9-inch (6th generation), and iPad Pro 11-inch (4th generation). For more help contact Customer Service at 800-922-0204. -Ross https://www.verizon.com/support/contact-us/
